name: Time
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: all those of the creature who summoned it

traits.name: The Law of Time
traits.desc: Enemies within 15 feet cannot take bonus actions or reactions.

traits.name: Chaos Vulnerability
traits.desc: The Inexorables have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells.

traits.name: Inexorable
traits.desc: The Inexorables are immune to any effects that would slow them or deny them actions or movement.

traits.name: Time Is Inexorable (Recharge 6)
traits.desc: At the end of the round, after all creatures have acted, Time takes another turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Haste (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Until the end of its next turn, Time magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.
